validations.name: EOLCheck
validations.description: Confirms there are no stray EOL characters in a data cell

validations.name: ARKCheck
validations.description: Confirms an ARK is valid and okay for UCLA use

validations.name: LicenseCheck
validations.description: Confirms a license is one of those prescribed by the IIIF specs

validations.name: ReqFieldCheck
validations.description: Confirms fields which are required are present in the CSV

validations.name: FilePathCheck
validations.description: Confirms a file exists at the file path found in the data

validations.name: ObjectTypeCheck
validations.description: Confirms 'Object Type' is either Collection, Work, or Page

validations.name: ItemSeqCheck
validations.description: Confirms 'Item Sequence' only has positive integers for values

validations.name: VisibilityCheck
validations.description: Confirms the Visibility field only contains an allowed value

validations.name: UnicodeCheck
validations.description: Confirms there are no characters outside the UTF-8 character set

validations.name: FileNameCheck
validations.description: Confirms there are no whitespaces in the 'File Name' data cell

validations.description: Confirms there are no EOL characters in a CSV file

validations.description: Confirms an ARK is valid and okay for UCLA use
